content.rendered:
Our Work

Recent fence installation projects

Our portfolio is more than a collection of our work; it’s a reflection of our clients’ trust – and our commitment to turning their visions into reality.

Striving for 100% satisfaction

Madison MihonkVerified Google Review
Read More
This company did a great job. They did a lot of extra things to accommodate our unique circumstances. The price was great and was done pretty quickly.
Scott RVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
Best experience I’ve ever had with a contractor. On time, great work, professional and the owner/sales was onsite helping until the project was completed to my satisfaction!
L SchmidtVerified Google Review
Read More
Tanya and her crew were very professional. All of our concerns were addressed promptly and taken care of. We would highly recommend Local Choice Fence.
Casey RVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
Very happy with the service! They showed up as scheduled and worked until after dark to get the job done. It looks beautiful. We will definitely call on them again and refer them.
D DeCarloVerified Google Review
Read More
Due to her professionalism and knowledge, we hired her on the spot. We couldn’t be more pleased. She went above and beyond our expectations.
Gail TVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
The 2 men worked so hard taking down old fence were so polite and hard workers. They did a great job in building an putting up the new one. They were professional and respectful.
Dan BredwellVerified Google Review
Read More
Tanya was professional, knowledgeable, and delivered what she promised. The crews workmanship was excellent as well. Couldn’t be more happy with the finished product.
Jasson OVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
They were great! They were fast and did great work! They are the first contractors who lived up to their promise since I have come to Florida.
Stacey RaischVerified Google Review
Read More
We are new to the Bushnell area and I came across Local Choice Fencing on Google. Right from the start they were professional, responsive and accommodating. I would do business with them again.
Dennis CVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
We are beyond happy with the work they preformed for us! They were very experienced and hard working and finished the job before schedule.
ErezVerified Google Review
Read More
The owner of the company really made sure that the job was done correctly and everything that needed to be fixed was fixed without any hesitation or problems! They worked with me very effectively and efficiently.
Jacqueline IVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
Tanya was professional from start to finish. She delivered on all that she had promised: the start time, reliability, speed, price and workmanship.

Fence forward with confidence

Let our fencing pros help you choose and install the perfect boundary for your home or business.

Get A Fence Quote
Contact Us
